exercises.title: Data Type Identification
exercises.description: Identify the data types of given values
exercises.instructions: Write console.log statements to check the types of: 'Hello', 42, true, {}, []
exercises.solution:
console.log(typeof 'Hello'); // string
console.log(typeof 42); // number
console.log(typeof true); // boolean
console.log(typeof {}); // object
console.log(Array.isArray([])); // true
